description: The Ebony Spleenwort is an evergreen species of fern that is truly amazing! With its long, leathery fronds in deep shades of ebony, it is sure to be a stand out in any garden. Its rich, deep green color and delicate texture makes it a cut above most other ferns and a welcome addition to any shady border. Its small, graceful shape is easy to maintain and adds a unique, graceful touch to the landscape. Low maintenance and drought-resistant, this species is a great choice for gardeners looking for a unique, shade-loving plant.
